Pricing Section with Multiple Plans.Layout: Grid layout with multiple pricing plans displayed in columns.
Pricing Section with Multiple Plans.Design: Clean, structured, and clear. Each pricing plan is enclosed in a card with defined borders and distinct background colors for headers.

Key Elements.Section Title: Centrally aligned heading 'Pricing' at the top.
Key Elements.Pricing Cards: Three distinct plans (Free Trial, Team, Enterprise) each within a card layout.
Key Elements.Plan Highlights: Each plan includes a title, description, feature list, and call-to-action button.
Key Elements.Feature List: Bullet points using icons to list features/benefits of each plan.
Key Elements.Call-to-Action Buttons: Prominent buttons at the bottom of each pricing card for user action (e.g., sign-up).

Pricing Section with Multiple Plans.Use Cases: Ideal for SaaS products, subscription-based services, or any business offering tiered pricing plans.
